org.spongepowered.api.event.entity

Interface EntityPotionEffectChangeEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, CauseTracked, EntityEvent, Event, GameEvent

    public interface EntityPotionEffectChangeEvent
extends EntityEvent, CauseTracked, Cancellable
    An event when an Entity gains or removes a PotionEffect.

    If the potion effect is being lost, setPotionEffect(PotionEffect) will have no change to the potion effect being removed. If a potion effect is being removed due to expiration, cancelling the event will have no change.

    • Method Detail

      • getPotionEffect

        PotionEffect getPotionEffect()
        Gets the PotionEffect being added or removed.
        Returns:
        The potion effect

      • isBeingAdded

        boolean isBeingAdded()
        Gets whether the entity is gaining the linked PotionEffect.

        If the potion effect is being lost, setPotionEffect(PotionEffect) will have no change to the potion effect being removed. If a potion effect is being removed due to expiration, cancelling the event will have no change.

        Returns:
        If the potion effect is being added

      • setPotionEffect

        void setPotionEffect(PotionEffect potionEffect)
        Sets the potion effect to be added to the entity.

        Setting the potion effect only changes the potion effect if the effect is being added, a check for isBeingAdded() is recommended.

        If the potion effect is being lost, setting the PotionEffect will have no change to the potion effect being removed. If a potion effect is being removed due to expiration, cancelling the event will have no change.

        Parameters:
        potionEffect - The potion effect to add

      • getCurrentEffects

        java.util.Collection<PotionEffect> getCurrentEffects()
        Gets a copy of all currently active PotionEffects on the entity.
        Returns:
        A copy of all potion effects active on the entity
